title: Critics of Pope Francis on Usury | Ep 70
description:
Pope Francis has emphasized usury to a greater degree than recent popes. How are liberal capitalists coping with this? What lessons can we learn about our own ideology and the social teaching of the Church from their responses?

Leonine Institute paper on usury

Acton blog post on Pope Francis & usury

Pope Francis on usury 1 & 2
